sections.Situation:
The Detective Boys, without Haibara and Ayumi, are walking in the street when they hear screams in a house. It turns out a lady and her daughter felled of the stairs and they treat the boys like they are robbers. The young woman's husband is trying to help the women, but they treat him as a servant.

Then, the Detective Boys, this time with Ayumi, are in a park and they see the husband of the house buying food. Ayumi recognizes him and says he is Ryoji Hirasawa, the husband of the daughter of Hirasawa family, a family who owns various properties around the city. The mother Seiko Hirasawa and the daughter and Ryoji's wife Kaori Hirasawa are part of the family, when Ryoji, who previously worked in an insurance company who had business with the Hirasawas married to the daughter. Ryoji trips and falls, but the Detective Boys help him and accompany him to the house. The women keep treating Ryoji as a servant and order him to cook for them, while they go jogging, but a minutes later the boys hear a scream, and find that the women were hit by a car.

The women are delivered to the hospital in an ambulance. Meanwhile, Conan managed to follow the car that ran over the women, and the driver is a young lady. Conan follows the woman who arrives to Beika Hospital and talks to Ryoji, who is also there. It seems the lady is an employee of the same insurance company employee mentioned before.

sections.Resolution:
Conan listens Ryoji saying how they both dreamed to obtain the Hirasawas fortune. Ryoji finds Conan who hided, and he starts to chase him. Conan deduces that all make sense now, and that the culprit of the stair fall is Ryoji, indicating that he is also part of the plot. Conan almost hides in a storage room, but Kinue catchs him and wraps Conan in a cloth. Meanwhile, the Detective Boys are worried of Conan, who dissapeared. Kinue and Ryoji are at one step of throwing Conan from the roof. Conan tells the truth to the Detective Boys and Takagi, and he orders to search for them. They finally throw him, but Conan manages to use the cloth as a parachute, but he falls. Hopefully, the rescue team had already installed an inflatable cushion.

Finally, Ryoji and Kinue are discovered and arrested and the Detective Boys start to cry, thinking that Conan almost died. The mother and daughter hopefully survive.
sections.Trivia: - The title of this episode pays homage to the mystery novel written by Seicho Matsumoto, which has the exact same name, "わるいやつら".
